channel.title: [HELP] Adding ticket exchange thing [HELP]
channel.description:
----What i need---- *alright, i wanted to make ANOTHER ticket exchange thing like the one that is at castlewars. [i have Cwars in my server, and the exchange guy, but i want another one] would it be possible, to make another one, and make it to you need a certian amount of tickets to get a item?
like this..
you kill the monster-->they drop a ticket-->you exchange the ticket for you're item..
Thanks ! :)
[b]Used SEARCH BAR [failed][/b]
[b][i][u][s]USED www.google.com, and ALL the private server tuts..[/s][/u][/i][/b]
[s]looked through the ENTIRE tutorial section on these fourms..[/s]
please help :) thanks. ~Sherman.

item.title: [HELP] Adding ticket exchange thing [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @TranScape TranScape
item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

Find a new ticket id make them drop it. If your client.java is delta you mise well make it bigger use commands checking for tickets then if they have enough make it so they delete them and add the item. Make a void that shows a interface with the rewards amount of tickets needed and command.

Read full topic
